qas.question: When did SEPTA service get cut?
Why did SEPTA rail service get cut?

answers.text: but lack of funding has again been the chief obstacle to implementation

qas.question: Name a proposed project to repalce it?

answers.text: Schuylkill Valley Metro to Wyomissing, PA, and extension of the Media/Elwyn line back to Wawa, PA. SEPTA's Airport Regional Rail Line Regional Rail

context: In <a0_0>1981<a0_0/>, large sections of the SEPTA Regional Rail service to the far suburbs of Philadelphia were discontinued due to <a1_0>lack of funding<a1_0/>. Several projects have been proposed to extend rail service back to these areas, <a2_0>but lack of funding has again been the chief obstacle to implementation<a2_0/>. These projects include the proposed <a3_0>Schuylkill Valley Metro to Wyomissing, PA, and extension of the Media/Elwyn line back to Wawa, PA. SEPTA's Airport Regional Rail Line Regional Rail<a3_0/> offers direct service to the Philadelphia International Airport.
